data.text: Good job today, boy. It's just like I've been saying─there's no faster thing on two legs than you.
Watch out, Gold Saucer. A new champion's headed to town real soon!
Nah, you want something better. You wanna climb mountains and run across the ocean, don't you?
That oughta be it for the evening rush. Time for a little shut-eye before sunrise.
Man, I hope everyone gets back okay tonight...
Just up ahead, you'll find Wall Market. A town so dark and messy even Public Security steers clear.

data.text: Think twice before diving in. Not everyone makes it out in one piece.

data.text: Hey, newbie. This delivery isn't due for inspection.
Huh? These ones addressed to Don Corneo?
Yes, idiot. Those ones.
Trust me, kid. There's a lotta things you're better off not knowing.
G-got it.
Mad respect for Sam. Guy's got total control over what comes in and outta town.
You get the occasional "missing" package or person, but... Hey, I know better than to ask questions.
Lease is for one day, payment in full up front. Can't fork over the gil, then someone else gets the spot. We clear?
Competition's fierce, but hey─opportunity ain't cheap.
I'll take it. It's always been a dream of mine to have a stall here.
We can arrange for some help for you, too.
Help?
You know─shills. We'll give you the grand opening discount 'n' everything.
Well...alright.
Step right up, step right up! It's the fully automated, state-of-the-art item procurement machine!

data.text: Ahhh shit... Must've fallen asleep or something.
Where's that girl I came with? Yoo-hoo? Lady?
And...where's my wallet at...?
Listen to that guy. Don't like sharing a room, then get the hell out!
Just gotta wait till sunrise―he'll pass out eventually.
This is what I get for being a cheapskate―a room with a hooligan!
Not gonna sleep a wink tonight. Wait─what if he tries to take my stuff?
No customers allowed back here, fella.
I know what you're looking for, and we ain't got any sauce.
Found it, did you? Your patronage is most appreciated.
Dunno about you, but this place sure is a lot...weirder than I thought it'd be...
Yeah? What'd you expect?
You know, something less, uh...
I say, let's cancel our reservation if you're scared. We don't need to sleep in a town like this, anyway.
What!? That idea's even less appealing to me...
Oh wow, would you look at it you guys!? The sights! The sounds! The squalor!
Quit being such a tourist. You're gonna get us mugged!
All we gotta do is steer clear of the shady areas.
So...where're the shady areas?
That's easy. Anywhere with a bunch of shady-looking people hanging out.
Like right where we're standing!?
C'mon, you guys, let's check out the town!
Hold on─lemme look at the guidebook first!
Don't be chicken. What's life without a little danger?
Exactly! We're in Wall Market! The town of pleasure and pain and pleasurable pain!
One more round, one more round!
Ten more rounds, ten more rounds!
Ah yeah! No gettin' off this train till first light!
Let's sing the ol' fight song! On three!
Yeah! ...Wait, where'd you go to school?
Oh yeah, guess I never introduced myself to ya.
Whatever! 'Nother round? Yeah, another round!
Kill me now. Of all the places to lose a wallet...
So weird. Could've sworn it was in my pocket.
Hey, you down for a "set"?
If you don't know, forget it.
No questions allowed.
Later.
That train better get here soon...
No need to panic. Shinra's got everything under control.
Aren't we gonna be late?
If we are, it won't be our fault. Blame it on those Shinra-hating nutjobs.
Worrying's not gonna get us home any faster, so I say we make the most of this.
You're so right. Let's enjoy ourselves while we can.
Real sorry, but...I don't have the gil...
Aw, you can't pay us what we're owed. Okay, don't even trip!
Oh, thank you!
There's a million different ways a man can make some gil around here. C'mon, let's go somewhere a little quieter and I'll tell ya all about 'em...
I-I'd really prefer...
Hey buddy. I wasn't asking!
C-coming!
Get your delicious materia pops right here─yes, right here! Dozens of flavors to try, including a mystery one!
Eat 'em two at a time and their flavor'll change! I'm telling ya folks, you ain't never seen frozen treats like this!
No one knows how they're made or what's in them―these treats're even more mysterious than the materia that inspired 'em! Don't miss out on these magical icy pops of wonder!
Look, there it is! Materia pops! The whole reason we came all this way!
Mmm, you have to taste the Blizzard! It's like my mouth's a lake of frozen fire! I'm totally not kidding!
Oh. My. God! Do you see this? The summon pops have little monster-shaped candies in them!
The chocolate chocobo and moogle is everything I wanted! How many other flavors do they have?
Did you know? Combining orbs'll change the flavor!
I recommend mixing lightning with magnify. It doubles the flavor's intensity!
It's like thundaga in your mouth!
Don't mix anything with transform, though, or you could wind up with toad-flavored ice cream.
Nothing beats this. Absolutely nothing...
You said it. Ya really can't have just one sip of the stuff, can ya...
It's all in the leaves. The magic.
Oh, master. Just one more cup―make it a real strong one.
Mm, yeah, that sounds good. Strong as you can make it.
Oh, I'm happy to pour you another, but these leaves, they don't come cheap.
I wouldn't stare like that if I were you. Folks around here don't much appreciate that sorta thing.
Well... It's not like I can really blame you for wanting to stop and take in the sights.
Take a look-see. This one's got bite!
An ancient miso pot... Certainly smells like it's got an edge.
I'm in the mood for bitter.
The Bitter Leaf Brew, huh...? Yeah, it's right there in the name...
I wanna bring my friends back something that's quintessential Wall Market, you know?
So something...filthy?
Hey, so I got that order for ya.
You take a peek?
Hey, I'm just a businessman. Ain't none of my business what I sell.
You're a smart man, that's what.
Hey. How much for this?
More than you got on ya.
Smart and bold.
So pretty, but so expensive...
Maybe one day I'll hit it big at the colosseum...
I did it! I hit it big!
Hey─hey mister! I'll take everything you've got!
I came to watch a...few matches.
In the underground colosseum you mean?
The fights're something they say. You'll never see action like it anywhere else!
Can't wait to make a few bets.
I like your style, man.
It's a rush that never gets old.
Yes! That match was everything I wanted!
You don't see fights like those every day.
My throat's raw from all that cheering.
Tonight, we're getting drunk!
Could we do something cheaper? I lost all my gil...
We'll hook you up, buddy. Plenty of places around here that'll lend you the gil you need...
You'd do that for me? All right, let's party!
Within me lies the power to bestow joy. Tell me, child. What is the happiness you seek?
I'm not asking for much, just...something to get me through the days.
The joy you crave can be found before your very eyes, in the form of this lucky item─which I shall part with for a small gratuity fee.
Oh, thank you. Thank you!
Within me lies the power to bestow joy. Tell me, child. What is the happiness you seek?
I just want what everybody else's got.
Heed these words of wisdom: all which is given in charity shall one day return to you tenfold.
I happen to accept donations─just putting it out there.
Oh, thank you. Thank you!
Within me lies the power to bestow joy. Tell me, child. What is the happiness you seek?
I wanna be the happiest person in the entire world!
Then you must be delivered from the bondage of wealth! For money is joy's bane. Give your gil to me─I will see to its safe disposal.
Oh, thank you. Thank you!
First drink half off, today only! Come to Drunkards', leave a drunkard!
How's about a drink, pretty lady? You sir, how about a pint or two?
Sing to your drunken heart's content at Drunkards' karaoke night!
Chocobo bean popcorn here! Shaped like everybody's favorite chocobos!
Get 'em while they're hot!
Can't have just one! The more you eat, the better they get! Fresh chocobo bean popcorn!
You gotta love the way they pop and crunch!
Yeah, these chocobo beans are amazing!
Er...you might wanna slow down...
Kweh!
...Or you'll start burping weird like that.
How is it these chocobo-shaped kernels pop into chocobo-shaped popcorn...?
Yeah, I was wondering the same thing.
Nobody knows the answer. One of the great unsolved mysteries of our world.
Oh, chocobo bean... What are you?
That crunch...
That pop...!
That flavor!
Kweh!
Chocobo beans're so good...
I literally can't stop eating 'em.
Gimme some of that Killer Caramel.
Only if you lemme try your Golden Garlic.
These beans can grant wishes, y'know?
Yeah─throw one in the air and catch it in your mouth and your wish'll surely come true.
And catch!
Up! Not at me!
I wish for my friend to buy me a whole bag of you!
Stop throwing 'em at me!
Please, kweh?
Oh, kweh off!
Those topsiders sure are weird, payin' good money to see this shithole.
Easy to see why. Must be borin' up top.
They treat this place like a zoo─like we're caged animals they can watch from a safe distance.
But stay down here too long, and you wind up in the zoo like everyone else.
And that's when the real fun begins eh? Either way, beats topside living by a mile.
Goddamn! The don rides us like rented mules!
But all those "employee benefits" make it worthwhile.
Streets are crowded tonight. Guessing that has something to do with the colosseum and Andrea's show...
...Not to mention whatever's going on topside.
This town helps you forget the real world, at least for a night. People come looking for that little escape.
A lovely lady like yourself shouldn't be walking these streets alone. Here, my arm.
Sure, it's a bit of mess at the moment, but this is the weapon vendor's collection.
Wow... Wall Market is wild...
Nothing to be scared of. They're not loaded...probably.
"Probably"!? Wall Market is really wild...
Nothing gets the blood pumping like a colosseum tournament!
That's your gambling addiction talking.
l feel so alive watching those crazy bastards whale on each other!
Because you're betting your life savings, you gambling junkie!
I can't wait for the next match!
Gotta admit, this tournament's a good one.
Go double or nothing on this next match. C'mon, chase the thrill!
Hard pass.
Hey there, sweetie. Got any plans? If not, ya wanna have some fun?
Well... Depends what kind of fun it is.
The gory type. Got an extra ticket to the colosseum. You can have it for cheap.
N-no thanks.
How about an all-you-can-eat voucher for the stalls?
Gimme that!
Wow, this is it... The gym where men become men.
It's absolutely legendary. Whew, my muscles ache just looking at it.
Huh...? What in the hell're you looking at?
Hey, man, stop starin'! ...I got a zit on my nose, all right?
Hot damn...
You gotta stop looking at me like that. You'll make me blush, girl...
You've been out here awhile. The missus inside?
Yep. What else is new?
How about you go and pull her out?
Because if I do, she'll make me buy her more clothes. I know 'cause...
...What else is new?
Ain't that sweet, though? Knowing you got a special someone waiting for you.
I guess...but still...
It's been two hours since my girl went in there. I'm thinking she forgot she left me out here.
Or is she punishing me for something? Or...is this some kind of test?
Hmm... I'll wait.
I have to trust that her love for me outweighs her love for fashion.
Of course!
I know why fate forced me to wait out here like this. It wasn't for her─it was for you!
Who knew that soulmates were real!?
My night's just beginning.
It's time I let my hair down.
I've gotta have some real fun.
Now, where should we go for round four?
Uh─pretty sure we're on round five.
Hold up. ...Where are we?
I got a place you're gonna love.
Ten gil an hour─no foolin'!
And the best girls in town!
Out of curiosity. Would you live topside if you could?
Not even if you paid me.
Same here. No way I'd wanna live under Shinra's thumb.
Yeah, but life down here isn't exactly safe.
What we lack in safety, we make up for in freedom.
And let's not forget about those reactor bombings, yeah?
Very true. These days it seems nowhere in this city is safe.
"Monster burger"? They use monster meat!?
Don't be an idiot. They probably call it that 'cause it's humongous.
But...what's it made of?
Like no meat I've ever seen... Damn does it ever look juicy, though.
Can I get the Ultima Monster Burger and the Omega Fries?
Oh, and go heavy on the Extra Damage sauce!
So that's what it's made of.
It's no secret really. S'okay to tell your friends.
Nah... I like being the only one in the know.
Still can't believe burgers made from that can taste this good.
Well, appearances can be deceiving.
Wall Market's changed for the worst. It's gotten too filthy, too rowdy. Why, when I was their age...
You were just as bad─admit it.
Well...I s'pose...
Place's really thrived since Corneo. Man brought order to this chaos.
Yeah, but ask yourself: was it worth the price?
Hey, that's not what you promised!
The hell with you and your "additional charges"!
Oh dear... The boss isn't going to like that.
Who's that?
Don Corneo. Who else?
Wait, hold on!
That's right. You're gonna pay your tab, either with gil or with blood.
Found this spot years ago. I love coming up here alone to watch the chaos down there.
So go find your own spot.
Lemme put it in words you'll understand: get lost.
How'd you like a piping hot bun filled with the finest, most delicious and delectable honey you've ever tasted?
Hey, I'm talking to you! I said they're good. Try one!
Think you're too good for my buns!? C'mere!
What the hell, man!? Quit picking fights with the customers!
These honey-filled buns are so soft and heavenly...!
So sweet...so rich!
It's like you're just...melting into a puddle...
Why be sad when you can savor this sweetness?
Really pushing those buns lately, aren't you.
They're topsiders─these folks can't get enough of the stuff.
Wait─thought your specialty was meat buns.
Yeah, but they ain't gonna be fans of the meat I use. Those topsider taste buds're different from ours.
Should we try something else for a change?
Who are you? And what have you done with my husband?
How about their latest bun, then? It's deep-fried.
On second thought...I'll stick with the usual.
It's so juicy!
I mean yeah, it's a heartache waiting to happen, but...
But man, that's why it's so damn good!
Whoa, look at that glow. What is it?
Why, it's the Wall Market's very own Potion Juice! A bubblicious blend of fantastic flavor and luminescence.
Wave it in the air to cheer on your favorite colosseum fighter! Or use it as a bedside lamp to set the mood for romance.
Just what I'm looking for!
Whoa, they're so pretty! I wanna try all the colors!
But, uh...what does it look like when it comes out?
Finally understand why so much of the food here is "Wall Market exclusive."
A lot of it would never be approved for sale up top. The ingredients, the additives... Yikes.
Downright criminal how delicious it all is, though, isn't it...?
Not from around here, are ya. Care for a guide?
How about a bodyguard? It's a rough sorta town, y'know.
No thank you.
Okay, how's about we sell you a guidebook?
Includes safety tips for how to get guys like us off your case. We'll even throw in some pepper spray to sweeten the deal.
You know...I'm sold! Give me one.
Pretty rowdy place, isn't it?
That's what folks from all over come here for. To get rowdy, let loose.
Lazy hedonists. Partying, stuffing their faces.
Well, we ain't much better. Sitting here, watching 'em...
Hey there, friend! Grab a seat, any seat that's open.
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: So what will it be?
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: If you want a recommendation, try the recommended special.
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Thanks for the help before. So─you hungry?
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Come on, what do you say? I'll even treat you to the recommended special!
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Um...what's "today's special"?
Why, it's the daily special platter!
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Okay...
Um, what's the "Mystery Fish Set"?
Why, it's a set meal with some fish!
I'll...have the barbecue.
Got nothing but love for the don. He's the man putting food on my plate. Hey─lemme get another order of barbecue and a glass of luchile!
Sure about that? You still got room for more?
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Made a little extra. Wanna spend it on some good eating.
Hey─I'll take that "Mystery Fish Platter"!
What about that barbecue I'm cooking?
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: Who says I can't eat both?
Hey... Gimme another round of that malboro stuff. On the rocks!
Ya got it.
data.speaker: Restaurant Owner

data.text: The other joints in town got nothing on this place. Food 'n' drink 'n' everything!
There you go again, talking all that bullshit.
You got a problem? Then say it to my face!
But I am sayin' it to your face!
That's how it's gonna be, then I got a few words for you!
Not till I'm done sayin' my piece!
Man! There you go again, talking all that bullshit.
Sorry, but just try to ignore them. Those two are always at each other's throats.
You know, it's kinda cute to watch them go at it.
Shh, listenin' time, okay? I'm tellin' ya... Mako? Nah. Shit's bad for the planet.
Don't start. You're gonna ruin the night.
Hey, this is serious shit!
Didn't the doctor tell you "lay off the booze"? Worry about your own health instead of the planet's!
Yeah, that's a good point, but counterpoint: I love drinking...
You could say that liquor's your mako.
Ah shit. Left my wallet in my other pair of pants.
In too deep now. Might as well knock back another one before I grovel.
Took my wallet. Can't trust anyone these days.
It's a hard lesson, but one you had to learn.
This stupid town can kiss my ass.
Not if you don't make it outta here alive first.
What an interesting little town this is.
Visiting's fine, but I can't imagine living here.
You not enjoying life up on the plate?
It's fine, I suppose. Convenient, if nothing else.
One more fire cocktail!
"Consume alcohol―don't let it consume you."
Oh please. I'm trying to let it consume me! I don't wanna be sober right now.
C'mon, join me for just one round. Please?
Fine. No woman left behind, right? One more fire cocktail over here!
You ready for...you know?
Oh, you bet. Got my orders in and everything!
Nicely done.
If I had to guess, I'd say it's coming from here...or there.
Same, that's why I came prepared.
You're on top of it!
Sing it loud, sing it proud!
This is my jam. It speaks to me!
I love it! You've got the voice of an angel!
Belt it out. You got this!
Top of the charts, baby─here you come!
My boyfriend needs encouraging all the time.
You'd be surprised what people are capable of if you pat them on the head and say "good job."
And if they still suck? Dump their ass.
Hey there, what'll it be?
Okay, coming right up!
One meat-lover's hot pot, and four beers!
Another order of dumpling stew for table three!
Hey there, friends. Welcome!
Let's get y'all a table.
Today's special is blowfish hot pot.
Bathroom's in the back, on the right.
I just wanna drink alone tonight...
But why isn't anyone hitting on me?
Up for a round of darts?
I'm pretty good, you know.
How's about if I win, you join me for a drink.
And if I win?
Drinks're on me.
So─ya wanna go for a round?
Been playing 'bout forty years now!
If you beat me, I'll treat you to a Potion Juice.
I ain't no pushover.
Quit hogging the bathroom! This is an emergency!
data.speaker: Man in Line

data.text: You gotta come out, man! I'm begging ya! Please!
data.speaker: Man in Line

data.text: Please... It's almost...
data.speaker: Man in Line

data.text: ...Never mind.
data.speaker: Man in Line

data.text: Welcome to Wall Market's premier weapons shop!
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Welcome! Come on in, take a look, take a look!
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: The collection out front belongs to my old man. It's not very organized, I know.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Your beauty is deadlier than anything I have here in my store!
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Do come again.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Thank you! I hope to see you again soon.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: I wish you the best of luck out there.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Huh. That old dude in the vacant lot next to the inn... That's the owner's brother?
Yeah, but there's bad blood between 'em.
Heard they had a falling-out over a tank or some shit.
Ah, so they're both collectors. That feud's gotta run deep...
They came this close to turning all that ordinance loose.
And blow us all to hell and back!?
We're safe for now. They've agreed to a cease-fire, apparently.
Damn. Sure hope that lasts...
I'd kill to get my hands on Shinra's Relnikha... Now that's a ship.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Ooh, and a complete collection of slug-rays. One of each variant!
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Oh yeah, that'd make my brother real jealous.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: If it's weapons ya want, then go talk to my boy at the counter.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Weapons are meant to be loved, to be cherished... Philistines like you just looking for a tool are better off talking to my son.
data.speaker: Weapons Vendor

data.text: Weight training is a battle between the athlete you are now and the athlete you wish to become.
data.speaker: Jules

data.text: You must hammer your weaknesses and hone your strengths in this never-ending-yet-always-thrilling quest for personal perfection.
data.speaker: Jules

data.text: Jules knows everything there is to know about muscles. Everything.
data.speaker: Ronnie

data.text: You can stay and watch if you want, but don't get in the way of my training.
data.speaker: Ronnie

data.text: We're always looking for new members, if you wanna join us.
data.speaker: Jay

data.text: Now─are you ready to get swole!?
data.speaker: Jay

data.text: How's this? Looking pretty good, ain't I?
Better than good. You're a beast!
Getting this ripped took a lotta blood, sweat, and tears! Mainly tears.
Hell yeah, bro. Preach it. Tears make the man!
Hey there. Interested in joining?
Ain't no gym like this one here. C'mon, let's get you signed up and on a program.
No better time to get ripped than the present!
That all you got? Like hell it is!
Can't...keep...going...
Don't quit on me now! You want a six-pack!? Then gimme ten more!
That's the spirit! Screw six-packs. You just got yourself a seven!
Find the rhythm, boys! One, two, three... Keep it up! C'mon now!
I am doin' it, bro. I'm doin' it!
I am doin' it, bro. I'm doin' it!
How's this!? And this?
How's this!? And this?
How's this!? And this?
Gym motto! Say it loud, say it proud!
My body's a temple! My muscles, religion!
The sweat off my brow is proof of my conviction!
Greet every day with a bunny hop!
Squat through the pain and tears and never stop!
And that is what it means to be a man!
Die, fat deposits!
Power through, muscle fibers!
Eat a dick, lactic acid!
Pick up the pace, vascular system!
And...two-second break!
Nothing beats a good protein shake!
Too much...protein...
Mixed and matched...too many supplements...
Thought pre-workout was supposed to make this easy...
Endurance and determination. That's what counts.
Fight through the pain... Almost done!
Oh no! Muscle cramp!
The true battle lies within the self.
I will become stronger. I will rise above!
Bring on the pain!
I will prevail. Gravity can't keep me down!
C'mon, take it up a notch. You can do this!
I. Can. Do. This!
Check me out.
It's almost scary how perfect I am...
Don't be shy. Go on, touch me!
Don't you dare quit on me!
Almost there. Keep it up!
All for...the...bod!
Come on! Push past your limit!
You got this! Don't give up!
I got this! I got this!
Imagine it's your boss...now kill!
Don't you lecture me!
Gimme my damn raise!
I'm talking to you! Hey!
Finish 'em off with a somersault and a flying uppercut! ...Uh...too much?
That's enough for one day...
Forgive me, my beautiful muscles, but you know I gotta be tough on you. Now, get some rest─tomorrow's another big day!
Hey there. Are you looking for anything in particular today?
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: Please, feel free to look around.
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: If you have any questions, just ask, okay?
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: My dad is one amazing designer! At least, he would be if he ever actually did some work.
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: Dad's the kind of guy who can't work without "inspiration."
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: Hmm... You just might be the perfect "inspiration" my dad's been missing...
data.speaker: Clothing Store Owner's Son

data.text: Word is, a famous designer owns this boutique.
Every rack and shelf is filled with the most inspired garments!
I'd love to meet the person responsible for all this beauty.
You look simply stunning.
Don't I just? This color, the design... It's fabulous!
Only thing is, the price is a little much...
Perhaps your boyfriend outside could chip in?
Oh, right! I completely forgot he was here.
There's nothing more fun than scouring the racks for the perfect piece!
Until I see the price tag and size, that is...
What about your husband? Isn't he waiting for you?
If he wants me, he'll find me.
That must be nice, having someone to go home to.
Depends on the "someone"...
When I shop in stores like these, I feel like a young woman again.
It's not quite my style, but...what's wrong with a little splurging?
Hey there. We're a pharmacy, but we stock other stuff too.
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: I have a decent selection. Take a look why don't you?
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: Everything I sell is legal. Nothing shady.
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: Thanks a bunch.
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: See ya around.
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: You got everything you need?
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: Thanks for your help! So, what're you looking for?
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: Take your time. Oh, and you didn't hear about the gambling from me, okay?
data.speaker: Pharmacist

data.text: What lovely flowers...
...For an even lovelier price.
Maybe this is the way I should express my feelings to him...
Excuse me. I was wondering─do you do deliveries?
Many of our customers send floral arrangements to the colosseum and the Honeybee Inn.
Nothing shows support like flowers!
Just between us, most of those floral arrangements end up going straight into the trash.
Oh my, that is sad...
Hey─can I get an octopus stir-fry?
Over here─deep-fried gysahl greens!
Gimme that beef and tofu thing with boiled pahsana!
Two egg-filled bombs over here!
Warm cup of icicle drop here!
You got it. Comin' right up.
Okay, here you are.
You remembered all that!?
Damn! You're a force of nature!
Nah, just an old hand.
I've done it again... Spent my whole paycheck on my favorite honeygirl!
Curse you, romance! Oh, why─why must you make fools of us all...?
Hey mister. How's business lately?
Can't complain really.
That's all you can ask for.
Yep. Long as I keep havin' nights like these, I'm golden.
Hey, that attack on the mako reactor? Apparently, there's more to the story than meets the eye.
You don't say. Well, lay it on me.
We'll be here all night if you get me started.
Uh, never mind.
We're next!
Only took us two hours!
Damn newspaper, doing a write-up about this joint...
Why're tourists always so damn chatty?
Let's get pot stickers.
At a place famous for ramen?
Just wait till you taste their broth!
Their noodles are made special in some shop in Sector 5!
Yeah, screw it─I'm getting the works!
I'm gonna get an extra helping of rice!
Amateurs, overlooking the buckwheat noodles...
Nothing beats their ramen, idiots...
How about wontons?
Oh wontons for sure.
You tried their seasonal stuff?
It was...all right.
All of us here are waiting for the ramen joint. The back of the line's down that way.
Their materia-infused broth is outta this world. It's definitely worth the hour wait, I'm telling you.
Hey there, pretty lady. You won't find better ramen anywhere else. Here, saved you this spot in line.
I swear, all men are dogs.
Got that right. Where do they get off, treating us like we're not even here?
Maybe I oughta give up. Quit screwing around, move back home, live with my folks again...
Yeah... I miss mine too. Home might be good.
Oh, this place is full up, too?
Goddamn tourists, takin' over our favorite dives. Thought this was our town...
I have it on good authority this place is amazing.
So? What's it to you?
The hairdresser─he's gorgeous! I want to bask in his radiance.
Put on a wig. That might work.
Oh, that's brilliant!
I was joking...
I feel guilty, being out here.
Just look at all these lights. I mean, don't they realize the city's down two reactors?
Not our problem. Turning off a few lamps isn't gonna make any difference.
It's not our job to deal with that kinda shit. It's Shinra's.
Heh. Think the world owes you a living, do you? Hope you're doing something to earn that attitude...
Hey, when's your next day off? We should hang out.
Well, this weekend, but...I've got a friend's wedding, so...
How's next next weekend, then?
Ooh, sorry. Busy... A funeral. Very sad.
Next, next, next weekend?
Well, the thing is...a month from now is my wedding!
Uh, congrats...
Here's my wedding registry!
Some rare liquor just came in. Do you wanna have a taste?
Look at that, "Icicle Vodka." Northern stuff, huh?
It's stronger than you might expect. Don't overdo it.
Like a lit match is enough to make it burn?
No...it'd be enough to make it explode.
You sure this is legal!?
Oh, honey. This is your first time here, isn't it? Just look at those shoulders, so much tension.
Relax, hon. We don't bite. Just enjoy yourself.
Oh dear, I drank too much...
Can't seem to walk straight.
Hey...can I lean on you?
You, my dear, are the reason I come back night after night.
Oh, stop it. I'm sure you say that to all your girls.
I wouldn't lie to you. Lemme prove it. I'll buy a whole bottle right now!
Aren't you sweet! That's why you're my favorite.
Look at her, faking drunk...
She pickpockets the men who try to help her.
Idiots get what they deserve.
God, I'm so bored...
There must be something to do.
Oh wow... Are you really from Sector 8!?
Why, yes, I am. I live close to Loveless Street.
I'm so jealous. I'd love to go someday!
Why not now? I'll give you the grand tour.
But...the trains... They're stopped, right?
They'll have them running again in no time. These sorts of things never last long.
Yeah, true.
Oh yeah, I forgot. Andrea's performing tonight!
Wanna go?
Sure, but there's no way we can get tickets the day of.
The Honeybee Inn certainly has an awful lot of female regulars...
That's because Andrea's shows have such appeal! There's no performer like him─his charisma is off the charts!
You're nothing but talk. Screw you, you lying jerk!
That's not fair. I've never lied to you!
Oh, give it a rest. I saw you with that girl!
Wh-what? That was ages ago!
Five years and ninety-five days ago.
...I'm sorry, okay? I'm sorry!
C'mon, boys. Thought you liked to party!
Listen, we've got work real early tomorrow.
Yeah, we gotta call it a night.
Wet blankets, all o' ya! Back in my day, we drank all night and went straight to work!
When'd you sleep?
While on the clock! When the hell else!?
And...the company didn't go under?
Y'all want a ticket?
Buying and selling.
I'm so lost...
The hell's wrong with this place?
It's all back alleys and creeps...
One more drink. What d'you say?
It's getting pretty late...
Late? Nah, the night's just begun.
One more. C'mon. I'm buying!
Fine...but only if we get ramen. That place up ahead is really good.
The one with the huge line?
That's the one. My husband runs it.
O-oh, would you look at the time? I better turn in for the night.
So tell me, how's the bar been doing?
Not great. There's a new place run by a girl much younger than me.
Aww, youth doesn't trump beauty. I, for one, love your bar!
Thanks for saying that, darlin'. Gotta keep going for the regulars like you!
Come on, old man. Time to go.
No! You can't make me! I wanna see the show!
Here we go again... You don't even have a ticket!
Then you put on a show. Dance for me boy!
You call that dancing!? You're just stumbling around like an idiot.
I'm standing completely still, Dad...
I'm so excited to finally see Andrea's show!
Yeah, you and me both!
Wait─you're just here for the honeygirls, aren't you?
What? That's not true! I'm here for the girls and the show!
I thought the shows at the Honeybee Inn were gonna be a little more, you know, on the provocative side.
Andrea's a genius with a remarkable eye for beauty. He doesn't need to resort to tricks.
This is Wall Market. You'll discover all sorts of shows and performances around here.
This place is absolute chaos, but it's amazing. We don't have anything like it up on the plate.
You hear that tracker working for Corneo got his ass handed to him in Sector 7?
You mean that guy always getting up in other people's business? I think he had it coming!
Makes you wonder, though. What was he doing in Sector 7?
I don't know but...it couldn't have been anything good.
No kidding! You're a regular at Madam M's?
That rush, that feeling of...whatever it is! I'm completely hooked! ...Though Madam M does scare me.
All she does is massage my fingertips, and it's goodbye, tension. How does she even do that?
God only knows... But yeah, she scares me too.
What's with these people? Is something going on tonight?
Well, yes. The Honeybee Inn should be opening their doors soon.
Did ya say honeybees? Be careful! Don't wanna get stung!
So...what's happening? Why's everyone here again?
The Honeybee Inn. Like I said, their doors are about to open.
Honeybees? ...Oh yeah! 'Nother round of that honey shit!
This is it─your destination. The famous Honeybee Inn.
Thanks for bringing us here.
We finally get to see one of Andrea's shows!
Oh, gosh. My heart is racing!
Careful of your blood pressure, you hear?
Don't worry. We have both a doctor and a mortician on standby should the need arise.
This is gonna be amazing. I can't wait!
I'm so excited, I can't breathe!
I know why you're here─to gawk at the honeygirls, right?
As if you're not here to gawk at the honeyboys?
Oh my god, I finally get to meet Andrea!
Just don't forget about the special cheer!
The audience is part of the performance. We have to help make it a great show!
"I am but a bee fluttering about the garden."
"How the honey doth bind my wings with its treacle."
"O poison sting, thy name is beauty!"
And that is the essence of Andrea Rhodea's show!
You're not gonna see a show as captivating as this anywhere else, not in all of Midgar!
'Cause Shinra's cracking down everywhere─everywhere but here that is.
Look! The doors are about to open!
Our sweet, sweet night is about to begin!
Have you played their honey fun and games?
Who do you think I am? Of course I have. I play every time I swing by here.
You're not getting hooked, are you? You're gonna get burned.
It's a little late for that. But I wouldn't call it a burn─more like a sting.
Everyone's got enough money to do whatever they want...
Maybe I'll find some on the ground...
Really cleanin' up tonight, eh?
Gotta stay sharp, though. Lifetime ban's a lifetime ban.
We're always on the lookout for new potential honeygirls and boys!
Wanna shake that moneymaker onstage?
You could live the life you've always wanted for yourself!
You've got what it takes, I swear on my mother's grave! You could take the entertainment world by storm!
Join us at the Honeybee Inn─be our next star!
I'm here for some good ol' cow time! Yeehaw!
Terrific! Now moo-ve your butt and join the rodeo!
I got in trouble with the manager 'cause I haven't been meeting my sales quota. He says if this keeps up, I'll have to hit the road.
Don't you worry, my sweet bovine beauty! I'll help you out!
Really? You're not just sayin' that? Wow─you're the best, partner!
I was ready to kill the guy who just left. He talked and talked for three whole hours about trains and timetables.
Ugh, people like him are the worst. It's, like, excuse me? I don't care.
No, that's not it. His "facts" were all wrong!
The first train Shinra created to support Midgar's infrastructure wasn't the Hoka 160!
It was the 70! But we're here to make customers feel good about themselves, so...
Oh. I didn't realize you were into that...
Honestly, this job isn't as easy as people think.
Tell me about it. It's starting to weigh on me a little bit.
But I really need the money! How else am I supposed to get a ticket for a premier seat at the Honeybee Inn?
I'll do anything to see Andrea perform. Even if it kills me!
Well, the heart wants what it wants, huh?
Wait a minute. Are you leaving already?
Yeah, I'm sorry. I've got some business I need to take care of.
I bet you're going to cow-cow somewhere else!
What are you talking about? It's work! I'll come back again soon, so send me off with a smile. Please?
Promise to spend more next time?
I pinky promise! The cow-cow, the squeeze-squeeze, the moo-moo. I'll buy it all!
I'll get the full set next time!
I can't wait to see you!
This is it? Your recommendation?
You bet your ass it is! You want to drink good booze? You want to talk to pretty girls?
And you said it was half off the normal price, right?
That's right, I did! But only for the initial charge.
Now don't just stand there─go on in! We'll give you a night you'll never forget.
I just need to wait here a little longer. She oughta be out soon.
I know she's not supposed to see any of her customers outside the bar, so I'm not gonna talk to her. But I'm no stalker.
I'm just curious to find out what she likes, how she lives, where she lives...
I'm just curious, that's all.
Howdy, partner! You wanna cow-cow with me? Or do you want the special moo-moo treatment?
We've got a half-off special right now! But only for the initial charge.
Drank a little too much.
Maybe the breeze will sober you up.
Such a beautiful night.
What are you talking about? It's the same old city. The lights are way too bright, and everything stinks of booze.
That stink? It's just you.
That the damn Honeybee Inn everyone's talking about? Looks tacky and gaudy to me.
With an exterior like that, who knows what distasteful things are going on inside?
That's it! I have to know. I need to see this distasteful behavior with my own eyes!
The neon glow, the laughter on the wind, the liquor on your lips... I love this town.
It has its share of creeps, but so does every town. This one just happens to have a little more than most.
I told you. You're not allowed to see me at work!
But...there's something I wanted to give you.
You can't be here. Now just go home!
How can you talk to me like that!? I just─
I just came to bring you your lunch because somebody forgot it.
You might be a grown man, but you're still a little brat.
Keep your voice down, Mom! You're embarrassing me! People can hear you when you raise your voice!
Hey...are you nervous too?
You bet I am. This is the first time in my life sitting in the premier section. It took me over half a year to save up for this!
Wow! I hope you enjoy the show.
So, you a topsider?
Yeah, my parents helped chip in for my ticket. I...didn't really earn this.
Oh, please, don't say that! We're both here for the same reason. Let's enjoy the show!
Yeah, let's!
I wonder if my honeygirl got the flower bouquet I had delivered.
It cost a small fortune, but it'll totally be worth it to see her smile just once.

data.text: I'd like to take this moment to officially declare to you my undying love!
data.speaker: Man in Love

data.text: What the hell did I ever see in you!?
data.speaker: Woman in Love

data.text: There you go again. Stop looking at other girls!
data.speaker: Woman in Love

data.text: I only do it to compare them with you so I can realize how lucky I am!
data.speaker: Man in Love

data.text: You know, I'm starting to think you're kind of an idiot.
data.speaker: Woman in Love

data.text: Eyes on me, babe. Just me.
data.speaker: Woman in Love

data.text: I don't know if that's something I can promise to do, baby.
data.speaker: Man in Love

data.text: Hey, you. We're looking for new hires. Wanna come work with us?
data.speaker: Critical Woman

data.text: With your looks, you could be the best in Wall Market. No, the best in Midgar if you wanted to!
data.speaker: Sharp-Tongued Woman

data.text: We hope you decide to join us!
data.speaker: Critical Woman

data.text: You could conquer the world with those cheekbones of yours!
data.speaker: Sharp-Tongued Woman

data.text: So close... There's just something missing...
data.speaker: Critical Woman

data.text: Anything less than gorgeous is just gonna get you chewed up and spit out.
data.speaker: Sharp-Tongued Woman

data.text: The bar needs to make a lot more money than this.
data.speaker: Critical Woman

data.text: We need pretty faces to get customers through the door.
data.speaker: Sharp-Tongued Woman

data.text: We'll go out and scour the town. We'll find the most stunning woman in all of Midgar!
data.speaker: Critical Woman

data.text: I'm gonna perform onstage next time! It'll be my big break!
Come on, Dad. Time to go home and get some sleep.
That was the best performance I've seen hands down!
Yeah, that'll be one to remember.
The crowd seems awfully excited...
Some guest performer took the stage and made a perfect transformation.
A transformation into what...?
Andrea was on fire tonight! He nailed every single move.
Well of course he did─but the kid next to him kept up with him to the end! Now that was impressive.
Oh, man! Best show ever!
No words. I have no words...
What's with the crowd? Somethin' going on tonight I don't know about?
There was a show at the Honeybee Inn and it just ended.
Well, ain't that something! Here's a toast to the Honeybee Inn!
Andrea's show was perfect─like a dream come alive.
My heart was racing so fast that my body's still trying to catch up.
I couldn't help but overhear. Need a sedative?
So? Did you see any cute honeygirls?
I dunno. What about you? Did the honeyboys treat you right?
Andrea was, of course, amazing as always.
But the guest performer was just as incredible! Does anyone know anything about them?
Ahh! It's like cupid shot me right through the heart!
The fiery passion of that performer melted my heart!
I enjoyed the honey fun and games a little too much!
Me too!
Look at everyone with their stupid smiles.
All having a great time, huh.
Huh. It's not often I see the crowd this excited after a show.
Man, I love the Honeybee Inn! This place is incredible! But I don't have the money to pay for any of this.
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: Relax, it's on me. Can't fly high without my wingman, y'know?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Just, uh...don't tell the missus, okay?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Hey, boss man─you sure this is where you should be?
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: I thought Shinra had all their employees working round the clock to deal with this reactor shit.
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: Truth is, I'm undercover. Avalanche is hiding out here in Wall Market...
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: and I'm here to investigate.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Are you serious?
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: It's my job─no, duty─to bring them to justice! I mean, the professionals will do all the heavy lifting, but still.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: But all I've seen you "investigate" tonight is the women here.
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: Anyway. All that's between you and me.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Got it! A top secret investigation.
data.speaker: Middle Manager's Friend

data.text: You're the one from the show! You were amazing! Topside girls have nothing on you!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: I've never felt so ready to take on the world! Middle manager of the month, here I come!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Your performance was...everything. Please─can I have your autograph?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: What a wild ride!
Wasn't it, though? No regrets.
I got to see my honeybee tonight. She gave me the energy to go on for another day!
I feel at least a decade younger!
Who was that guest performer?
The way they were in sync every step of the way without missing a single beat... Ooh, I'm so jealous!
The evening performance has ended. We hope to see you again very soon.
data.speaker: Receptionist

data.text: I must say, you were breathtaking.
data.speaker: Receptionist

data.text: I've never been so happy in my entire life. Now there's nothing left to do.
Except pay off my huge debts.
They really pulled it off. That was one incredible performance.
I can honestly say, this is a night I'll never forget.
Promise to come back soon?
data.speaker: Honeygirl

data.text: Don't be a stranger!
data.speaker: Honeygirl

data.text: After all, we honeybees need fresh flowers to pollinate!
data.speaker: Honeygirl

data.text: That show was some sort of miracle!
I can't believe what I saw was real!
That girl was the definition of sexy!
I didn't know there was gonna be a guest performer!
That girl was beautiful. Who is she?
People will talk about this show for years to come!
We must be the happiest people in all of Midgar.
I love you, Andrea! You're so hot!
The Honeybee Inn's my favorite place in the world!
This was definitely worth the trip!
I need to come back here again!
It's art. No other way to describe it.
The price might be high but you get your money's worth.
It was indescribable!
Tonight may be the best night of my life.
Wow! I can see why people keep coming back!
She was stunning─ethereal!
How can anyone be that gorgeous!?
It left me breathless!
Amazing! That was worth the gil.
Exquisite...no─celestial...
I'm absolutely speechless!
It moved me. I don't even know what to say.
It was a thousand times better than I'd imagined!
My hands are still shaking from excitement!
I'd do anything for you, Andrea!
It's indescribable!
Nice.
Wow, she's one cute chick.
She's cute, but...what's up with that outfit?
Oh, yeah... That I like!
Hey! Check out that hottie over there!
She's got such a pretty face, but...
She's gorgeous.
Who is she? Some sort of princess?
That is one boring dress.
Ooh, pretty girl coming through!
Wow! This day cannot get any better.
She must not have a lot of money to spend.
Would you look at that! Where's she going?
I definitely like what I see!
Might not be your type, but I like her.
Looking good tonight, beautiful!
She should be standing on top of a wedding cake!
I can tell her dress's kinda cheap. It shows.
Why is her outfit making me hungry?
Look at her! She's exquisite!
Why would anyone choose to wear that?
Maybe I should chat her up.
What I wouldn't give to date a hottie like that.
Come on, don't stare. It's rude.
She is really, really hot.
She's gotta be seeing someone, right? How can she not be?
We all have our own problems in life.
Looking at pretty girls makes my heart race like crazy!
That is the perfect outfit!
Hmm...
Look at her! She's cute!
That girl in the dress is breathtaking!
Well, it's simple, and there's nothing wrong with that, but...
A natural look─I love it!
Now that is one hot dress!
That outfit she's wearing is not doing anything for her.
Aw, so cute!
Wow, what a beauty!
That dress is not doing her justice.
I kinda want to root for her.
She looks gorgeous!
She's so pretty, but...
I think she looks great!
I don't even want to know how much that dress cost.
Check out that cheap-looking outfit.
Oh, my god, I love her style!
Wow, Corneo's gonna drool all over her.
Let's try not to stare.
When you're cute enough, you can pull anything off.
Wait, isn't that the most expensive dress on the market?
That is a beautiful woman...
Wow! Check her out!
Who's that? She some sort of model?
Bet she comes from a good family.
Dude, you should go talk to her. Say hi.
That is a goddess!
There's no way I have a chance.
She's so beautiful it's almost surreal.
Now she looks like a chick who works out.
She could definitely stop traffic with those looks.
Take me with you!
My queen!
I would give anything to get to know her.
She's the prettiest girl I've ever seen!
Love to see her crack a smile.
Can't stop staring...
I heard she danced onstage at the Honeybee Inn.
Aw, man, she's way outta my league.
Hey, there! Can ya gimme a smile!?
If I could go on just one date with her...
Oh, my god! She's so cute!
Wow, who's that girl? She's stunning!
She's definitely not like you or me!
I'd give anything to look like that!
Look at her skin! It's absolutely flawless!
I would die to get my hands on that dress!
The world really is unfair...
She looks like a fairy-tale princess!
I love her attitude! She's so cool.
Love. That. Look. Love it!
Is she blushing? Her face looks a little flushed.
Now that's a breathtaking beauty.
No way! She's prettier than me!?
Damn, check her out!
You hear about the new merc? They say he's ex-military.
Yeah, right. Sure he is.
I have so much work on my plate.
If only someone would lend us a hand.
You know, why don't we hire that merc to be our tour guide?
Better not. Who knows what his deal is?
I still can't believe it. That merc won the Corneo Cup.
No way! So you think it was just another job for him?
I saw the new colosseum champ down in Sector 5.
Madam M's got the merc wrapped around her finger.
Heard he was wrapped around more than that.
Didja hear? The mercenary started a business.
Without saying anything to us first? I see how it is.
There's a merc in town that can take on any Midgar beast!
Really? I wonder what they're like.
That mercenary's been helping out all over.
Yeah, especially around Sectors 5 and 7, right?
Hey, that hair... Isn't that Cloud? The merc?
Hey, it's him─that merc from Sector 5. What's he doing here?
You know, I've heard from more than a few people that my son, Johnny, has been roaming the streets of Wall Market.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: Before he leaves town, I need to make sure I deliver him his lucky pillow. I have faith in my boy, of course.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: But a growing man needs plenty of sleep─sleep of good quality, no less. That's how mind and body stay healthy and active. In other words, this pillow is crucial to his health.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: My wife is back in Sector 7. I thought it best she wait for me there because the establishments in this town are, uh, provocative.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: Of course, I haven't been to any myself so I don't know what goes on around here. Not in the slightest.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: Wall Market really is one helluva town, isn't it?
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: I'm sure my son Johnny learned a lot of lessons about life right here. The hard way, of course.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: Oh, my beautiful boy! As your father, and as someone who's been where you are, I look forward to seeing the man you become.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: I heard there was some sort of tournament going on. That must be why it's so crowded.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: It almost made me miss a chance to get a ticket to my favorite place.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: What's that? Oh, I could never tell!
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: Congratulations on winning the tournament! You're an impressive fighter!
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: I know that you'll be a great influence on my Johnny. Why, you might even end up having a friendly rivalry!
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: You can spur each other to greater heights!
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: I can see it. You two will become great friends─the best of friends.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: I tell you, I'm exhausted from all the fun and excitement of that tournament. I'll look for my son tomorrow. For now, though, I really should get some rest.
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: And what's rest without a little relaxation for the body, mind, and soul? Fortunately I'm in the right place for that...
data.speaker: Johnny's Father

data.text: The battle is joined, and already I can tell you this bonus match will not disappoint!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This couple has fought the toughest of the tough, the meanest of the mean, but can they handle the horror of the Hell House!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Who will come out on top!? Strap yourselves in, folks, 'cause this show is only getting started!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Seems they're sizing up the competition!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: If those walls could talk, just imagine all the nasty things they'd have to say about their opponent!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Ooh, can you feel it? The tension in the air─it's so thick I can taste it!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: It's getting hot in here─my palms are sweating! The mic nearly slipped right out of my hand!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: I'm sure the demonic domicile felt that one-two punch! But its walls won't buckle so easily!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: No trespassers allowed on the Hell House's property! Now that's some impressive home security!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Big bad Aerith is huffing, and she is puffing, but can she blow the Hell House down!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Aerith's attacks are packing a real wallop! Could the Hell House have met its match!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This rose has some sharp thorns!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Who knew the Hell House had an appetite for magic!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: It's Midgar's house of the future―today! Eco-friendly and magic-absorbent!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Fire, ice, lightning─who knows what magic will work! It really is the house from hell!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: That had to hurt! Has our dynamic duo already found this house's major design flaw!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Oof, that color is a dead giveaway! The architect must've had one too many when he designed this thing!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: A barrage of furniture is headed straight for our capable couple! How will they deal with this terrifying surprise!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: It looks like it's raining missiles today, folks! The Hell House has got its murderous eyes on the prize!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is d-d-d-down! Cloud is taking control of the fight and is really showing this building who's boss!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Get a load of those bulging biceps! I know what Aerith sees in him!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Well, that sure ain't workin'!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Nope! Not gonna cut it!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Not even so much as a flinch!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Will sheer persistence win the day?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Their attacks sure seem to lack a punch, don't they!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: I'm sorry, ladies and gentlemen, but this is painful to watch!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Not this time! The Hell House ain't havin' none of it!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Ooh, that was a bad idea, wasn't it folks!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Sorry lovebirds─wrong element!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Who knew the Hell House had an appetite for magic!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: They shoot, they score! Look out, folks─Cloud and Aerith, are going for the jugular!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: How about it, Hell House! You gonna take that lying down!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Boom! That's how it's done, folks!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Talk about a showstopper!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Just try and call this house warm and inviting now! We dare ya! We double-dog dare ya!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is showing us its true paint job! How will Aerith and Cloud adapt?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Ladies and gentlemen, you haven't seen anything yet! This fight is only just heating up!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Cloud is going on the offensive! But will he be able to put that abominable abode in its place!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This haunted house just got a whole lot creepier, folks! What weird and evil designs is it cooking up this time!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The lovebirds are going hard at the house, but they'll have to do better than that if they wanna raze this roof!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: It's an engineering marvel! This home is so secure, even magic bounces right off!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Here comes the windup, folks! Brace for impact!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: There'll be no coming back from this one!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Listen close, folks, and you may just hear Cloud scoffing at that pathetic excuse for a barrier!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Cloud, why you gotta be so cool!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Aerith is breaking down barriers and peddling pain!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Talk about a girlfriend you can rely on! Be still my beating heart!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is falling apart at the seams! This building is no longer up to code!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Hey-oh! Aerith and Cloud, here to deliver a smackdown!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Did ya think it was over? Think again! This house is built to last!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The barrier's still holding! Does our dynamic duo have what it takes to defeat the security of this high-tech home!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is ready to shove its message of hate down their throats!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Who has been caught in the Hell House's sights!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: We got a live one here! Be afraid! Be very afraid!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: These two got on the wrong side of this house! Can our couple cope!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: And the barrier is back once again! Is there no way through!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is making sure they stay out!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The house isn't messing around today!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: This house takes security very seriously!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Cloud and Aerith are on a roll─but can they keep it up!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Hah! They may just take the cup! But it's still anyone's game, folks!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The fortunes of these contenders are still in flux, and there's no telling what might happen!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: The Hell House has had enough of these noisy neighbors!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Indeed, it's doing everything it can to take out the trash!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Liftoff! We have liftoff! Ladies and gentlemen, are you seeing this!? The world's first flying house!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The crowd is going wild, but no amount of applause is gonna bring this house down!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The house has spread its wings and taken flight! Never gets old, does it, folks!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Talk about making an impact! The Hell House is absolutely tearing it up tonight!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Batten down the hatches, folks, because a storm is brewing on the horizon!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Our tremendous twosome has put on their hard hats! They know exactly what they need to do to make this house come crashing down!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: They're bringing that high-flying house back down to earth!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: We're in the final stretch of this special, once-in-a-lifetime match! But has our power couple done enough to take home the cup!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This could end at any moment! Need to use the bathroom? Suck it up!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: What's this? The ol' switcheroo!? As usual, the Hell House is up to no good!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: The Hell House has raised a new and improved barrier! How will Cloud and Aerith respond!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This house has had enough of the neighborhood riffraff!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is about to stick the landing! Watch out, or you'll be squashed!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: We're looking at the most intense stare down yet! Who will break first? Who will crack!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Looks like our couple's in for another round of musical chairs!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Another barrage of chaos coming in hot, folks! Will this turn the tide against them!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Who knows where this match is headed!? I sure don't.
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: There's still plenty of surprises in store tonight!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Don't look away! Don't even blink! I'm telling ya─you don't want to miss a second of this!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The colosseum has never witnessed such a fearsome battle!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: History is being written right here, folks, right here─in the colosseum tonight!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Betting is still open on tonight's spectacle!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: It is a real honor to host this grand event!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Is it me, or is that Aerith chick just the prettiest little thing?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: I hope you are all enjoying tonight's historic match!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Let your cheers and jeers echo throughout all of Midgar!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: This housewarming party is putting their love to the test! Are they strong enough to pull through?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Or will the raging fires of hell leave nothing but ash and cinders!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Where'd these chairs come from? Who do they belong to? Who needs all those chairs? I have so many questions!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Our favorite couple is about to get a face full of flame! Is there any way to escape the heat!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: These missiles are serious business! Who knew the Hell House was capable of such carnage!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Cuddly little stuffed animals are raining from the sky! It's so cute I could die!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Don't you just wanna gather up all those adorable little guys and hug them and never let go!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Stuffed animals are available at the colosseum gift shop. The perfect present for friends and family!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Available only while supplies last so act fast!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: It looks like the Hell House is throwing a neighborhood get-together! And our lucky couple's been invited to the soirée!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Cloud and Aerith have not-so-politely declined the invitation! No party today! I almost feel bad for our lonely little guy─don't you?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The forbidden door has been thrown wide!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Will the allure of hospitality prove to be too much!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: The Hell House is making a hard sell! Question is, are Cloud and Aerith buying!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Talk about persistent! Will Cloud and Aerith give in to the house's pressure!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: And with that, the gateway to hell slams shut!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This house is hungry, and it's about to chow down on the competition!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: What is going on in there!? Only time will tell, but I'm not sure we wanna know!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Someone's getting chewed up! But will the Hell House be kind enough to spit 'em back out!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: The dynamic duo is faltering. Could this be the end!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Folks, it's not looking good for the lovebirds in this brutal battle!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Can Cloud and Aerith get their act together before it's too late!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Can it be!? Does the Hell House have the upper hand!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: What a brutal hit by the Hell House! There's no way that didn't hurt!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Oh, man! Did anyone get the number of that house!?
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Now that had to hurt, folks! Are these moves even legal!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: The Hell House isn't afraid to fight dirty!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: The Hell House has welcomed its first guest! What kind of party is it!? I don't know, but I'm glad I wasn't invited!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: A miraculous escape from our courageous contender! But from the looks of it, they had a pretty wild time in there!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: And Cloud is back with us once again...or is he!? The masticating mansion did a real number on the man!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Aerith is back in the action─but not for long! Our lovely lady is down for the count!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Cloud has seen better days! Can he keep fighting the good fight or is he ready to throw in the towel!?
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Aerith is trying to hang in there, but a stiff wind could bowl her over! The forecast calls for pain!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Cloud is shaken─and stirred! I bet he's not gonna be standing for much longer!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: Ouch, that's gotta hurt. Aerith gets a double dose of neighborly hatred!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: And there goes Cloud! He's down!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: This could be the beginning of the end for our lovebirds!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Ladies and gentlemen! Cloud is down!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: And Aerith is down for the count!
data.speaker: Scotch

data.text: Can you hear that, Midgar? Aerith fans are not happy!
data.speaker: Kotch

data.text: And Aerith is down for the count!
